trans-unit.source: Represents a secure client session for user activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用者啟動、授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: 如同其他<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>型別，<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>才可用於完全信任應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> class
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>類別

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest" /> specified when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得建立 <see cref="P:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest" /> 時指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />。

trans-unit.source: The application manifest specified to the <see cref="Overload:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create" /> method when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="Overload:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create" /> 時，指定給 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 方法的應用程式資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.ApplicationManifest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 建立安全的用戶端工作階段，以便進行版權管理作業。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法來建立安全的環境。

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式權限資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 要授與版權管理內容存取權的使用者或使用者群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session for a specified user with a given rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 以指定權限資訊清單為指定的使用者建立安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 啟動、授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method is intended for use with users that are already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法供使用與已啟用的使用者，例如從傳回的清單中提供<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method for users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 使用替代<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法尚未啟動的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法來建立安全的環境。

trans-unit.source: The application rights manifest.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式權限資訊清單。

trans-unit.source: The method of authentication.
trans-unit.target: 驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: The type of the user rights account certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用者權限帳戶憑證的類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a secure client session given an application rights manifest, <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" />, and <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立獲得應用程式權限資訊清單的安全用戶端工作階段，<see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.AuthenticationType" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.UserActivationMode" />。

trans-unit.source: A secure client session for activation, license binding, and other rights management operations.
trans-unit.target: 啟動、授權繫結及其他權限管理作業的安全用戶端工作階段。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method is intended for new users that are not yet activated.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法適用於新的使用者尚未啟用。

trans-unit.source: Activating a new user includes a roundtrip server transaction to obtain the User Certificate and Client License Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 啟動新的使用者包括來回伺服器的交易，以取得使用者憑證和用戶端授權憑證。

trans-unit.source: The alternate <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A> method can be used if a user is already activated, such as provided in the list returned from <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 替代<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create%2A>方法可以用如果已啟用使用者，例如從傳回的清單中提供<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.GetActivatedUsers%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this method to create a secure environment.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個方法來建立安全的環境。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: The application should call <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> when finished with the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式應該呼叫<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>完成<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>。

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> is called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> are reclaimed by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>呼叫時，配置給資源<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>記憶體回收行程會回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> before the last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> is released.
trans-unit.target: 請務必呼叫<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>之前的最後一個參考<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>釋放。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> is not called, resources allocated to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the instance's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>不呼叫時，配置給資源<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>將不會釋放記憶體回收行程呼叫的執行個體之前<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> invokes the protected <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose> 叫用受保護<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29>方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 <see langword="Dispose" /> 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the activated users.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已啟動使用者的清單。

trans-unit.source: A list of the currently activated users.
trans-unit.target: 目前已啟動使用者的清單。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group for granting access to rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 要授與版權管理內容存取權的使用者或使用者群組。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a given user has been activated for accessing rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否已啟用指定使用者存取權限管理內容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the given <paramref name="user" /> has been activated for accessing rights managed content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用指定的 <paramref name="user" /> 來存取版權管理內容，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.IsUserActivated%2A> method to determine if given user has been authorized to access rights managed content.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.IsUserActivated%2A>方法來判斷如果提供已獲授權使用者存取權限管理的內容。

trans-unit.source: The user to remove the license activation for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其移除授權啟動的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Removes the license activation for a specified user.
trans-unit.target: 為指定的使用者移除授權啟用。

trans-unit.source: The user authentication must be performed either with Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 驗證或 Passport 驗證，則必須執行使用者驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="user" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="user" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The given <paramref name="user" /> is not authenticated with either Windows authentication or Passport authentication.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="user" /> 未經過 Windows 驗證或 Passport 驗證的驗證。

trans-unit.source: Gets the user or user-group specified when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 取得建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 時指定的使用者或使用者群組。

trans-unit.source: The user or user-group specified to the <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser)" /> method when the <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> was created.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="M:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.Create(System.String,System.Security.RightsManagement.ContentUser)" /> 時，指定給 <see cref="T:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment" /> 方法的使用者或使用者群組。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.User%2A> property
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範搭配<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment.User%2A>屬性
